1. Press the long M key to turn on the machine 
 
2. Please insert the test paper into the slot after sucking blood 
 
3. Please slide the left button to turn on the Bluetooth, and the blue light on the upper left corner is on

1. Press the power button on the right to turn on

2. Please put your finger into the blood oxygen clip

3. When the value appears on the screen, please click the "Start Measurement" button below

1. Press the button at the bottom of the screen to power on

2. Press the button on the back of the ear thermometer to determine the temperature

3. When you hear the sound, click the "Start Measurement" button below

1. Insert the test strip in the direction indicated by the arrow and turn it on automatically.
2. Confirm that the code number of the test paper on the screen matches the test paper box.
3. Use a blood collection pen to obtain a fingertip blood sample.
4. The test strips draw blood samples.
5. Measurement data appears after the screen countdown ends.

6. Click "Save Data" and the measurement data will be stored in the system platform.
7. Withdraw the test paper and discard into the biochemical pollutant container.

1. Connect the cuff to the blood pressure meter correctly, expose your arms, palm up, and straighten your elbows, and put on the cuff.
2. The cuff trachea points to the lower arm, and the lower edge of the cuff is 2–3cm away from the elbow socket.
3. Place the cuff hose at the pulse point of the brachial artery.
4. Sit still for 3 minutes before the measurement, keeping the center of the cuff at the same height as the heart.
5. Press the [Power] button to start measurement.
6. Please do not speak or move your body during the measurement.
7. After the measurement is completed, when the value appears on the screen, please click the [Save Data] button below.

It is detected that both hands leave the electrode pad
Finger and electrode pads may be in poor contact \n\nPlease hold your hands and hold the metal piece

Control the three highs (high blood fat, high blood pressure, high blood sugar), maintain good habits and control weight, help maintain the health of blood vessels and reduce excess work in the heart.

When you are under stress or tension, your heart rate will speed up, and it can also cause irregular phenomena. It is recommended to maintain a calm mood and find an appropriate way to relieve stress \nMethods can help maintain health.
You can also refer to the chronic fatigue index. If the chronic fatigue index shows a yellow light or a red light, it means that the pressure has accumulated for a long time, you must pay attention.
Avoid long hours of staying up and being overworked, and rest properly. If the body is unwell for a long time and the rest cannot be improved, it is recommended to go to the hospital immediately.
1. Press and hold the power switch for about 2 seconds \n2. The power indicator lights up \n3. Complete the preparation for booting

1. Lightly press the device in front of the chest \n2. The four electrodes need to be in stable contact with the skin \n3. Do not shake during measurement

Wait for measurement ... \n\nAfter the measurement is completed, you can get the result.
1. Extend your arm into the arm barrel, \nput your elbow in the depression.
2. Maintain a correct sitting posture, \nPress the [Start / Stop] button, \nStart measuring blood pressure.

Reference range: the general population: systolic blood pressure<120(mmHg), diastolic blood pressure<80 mmHg)\n Chronic disease, the elderly: systolic blood pressure<140 (mmHg), diastolic pressure<90(mmHg)

1. Sit for 5 minutes before the measurement, the center of the device and the heart remain at the same height; \n2. press the [switch] button on the front of the device to start the measurement; \n3. stay relaxed during the measurement, do not speak And move the body.

1. bare arms, palms up, elbows straight, sleeve cuffs according to the arrow direction of the cuff logo; \n2. the main interface of the device host is placed above the brachial artery, and the distance between the cuff lower edge Elbow fossa 1-2CM.

1. The center of the arm barrel and the heart are kept at the same height during the measurement. \n2. Confirm that the device is turned on. \n3. Please do not speak and move your body during the measurement.

1. connect the device, open arm, palm up, elbow straight, sleeve cuff \n2. cuff trachea points to the lower arm, the lower edge of the cuff is 2-3cm from the elbow fossa \n3. The cuff hose is placed on the pulsating point of brachial artery

1. Sit for 5 minutes before the measurement, keeping the center of the cuff and the heart at the same height. \n2. Press the [Switch] button to start the measurement. \n3. Please do not speak and move your body during the measurement.

The device was not found.\n1. Please make sure that the Bluetooth of the device is turned on.\n2. You can try to manually turn on the Bluetooth by long pressing the "Time" button of the device.

The connection failed. \n1. Please confirm that the device Bluetooth is turned on.\n2. You can try to turn on the Bluetooth manually by long pressing the device "Time" key.
